backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with authorization, storing contact requests and user profiles, exposing submit/view contact and profile CRUD with admin/user checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the required update to HeroSection.tsx background image and listing related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of multiple frontend files including layout, components, styling, and configuration details.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Specifies that the .well-known directory should be included in deployed frontend assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and global element defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining metadata, fonts, and the root element for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: IC custom domain verification file listing the root and www domains.
frontend/public/robots.txt: SEO robots.txt allowing all major crawlers full access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component composing the landing page sections and footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section with descriptive text, trust indicators, and an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Simple Formspree-powered contact form with required fields and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section combining the Formspree form with contact details and social links.
Renders a features section with four feature cards, titles, descriptions, and a YouTube CTA link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a caffeinated.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Provides a full-screen hero with background image, headline, description, and buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Shows a consultation booking section that loads and displays a Calendly embed when triggered.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Empty or placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and global CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base styles for body and html.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scrolling helper that scrolls to a DOM section ID while accounting for header offset.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, including requirements to replace the hero background image and add the uploaded asset.
